name: GoCardless
headline: Weâre building the worldâs bank payment network.
description:
At GoCardless we believe that bank payments are the best way to pay and get paid. We help businesses collect both recurring and one-off payments, without the chasing, stress or expensive fees.

Weâre building a global bank payment network that lets people make and collect payments straight from their bank account, across multiple countries and currencies. 75,000+ businesses around the world trust us to power their payments. We enable them to collect payments from 30+ countries, processing over $30 billion each year.

Our suite of add-on products are helping businesses face their payment challenges head on. From automatically recovering failed payments, to challenging charge backs and fighting fraud - all without compromising their customerâs payment experience.

Our open banking leadership unlocks the ability to make and accept direct bank payments confidently and securely. And our acquisition of Nordigen means weâre also helping businesses make faster and more informed decisions by accessing and generating insights from their customersâ bank account data.

Weâre also backed by some of the worldâs leading investors including Accel Partners, Bain Capital Ventures, Balderton Capital, GV (formerly Google Ventures), Notion Capital, Passion Capital, Permira and Salesforce Ventures. We're a global team, with offices in London, Paris, Riga, Melbourne and New York.

founders.name: Hiroki Takeuchi, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Hiroki is co-founder and CEO of GoCardless, a global leader in direct bank payment solutions. Prior to founding GoCardless, he worked as a Business Analyst at McKinsey & Co before succumbing to the entrepreneurial bug and enrolling in the Y Combinator program. He studied Mathematics at Oxford University where he served as Vice President of Oxford Entrepreneurs.

founders.name: Tom Blomfield
founders.description: Cofounded GoCardless (YC S2011) and Monzo (YC Continuity). Now a partner at YC, based in San Francisco.

## Payments. But without the hassle.
### End late payments
Easy for your customers to make instant, one-off payments. Or set them up for automated payments, so neither of you has to lift a finger.
### No more chasing
With GoCardless, you don’t have to rely on your customers remembering to pay on time. Saving you all those costly hours chasing up late payments.
### Automate admin
Easily see the status of any payment from any customer, any time. And if you connect GoCardless to your accounting system, reconciliation is automatic.
### Forget expensive fees
GoCardless collects direct bank payments. Meaning no card fees. And with all that wasted admin time cut away, the savings really stack up.
## Everything your business needs
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1198'%20width='1980'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](http://gocardless.com)![Instant, one-off payments](https://images.ctfassets.net/40w0m41bmydz/6OIb7b3IOIMZRF2tIND2Bw/7a03fcb225b4da044d2ee3ee753535c5/c-card-one-off-en.png?w=1296&h=784&q=50&fm=png)
### Instant, one-off payments
Let your customers pay directly from their bank account. It's quicker and easier than a manual bank transfer, and skips the high fees of card payments. That means better for you and better for them.
[See how one-off payments work](http://gocardless.com/<https:/gocardless.com/solutions/instant-bank-pay/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1198'%20width='1980'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](http://gocardless.com)![Automated, recurring payments](https://images.ctfassets.net/40w0m41bmydz/li5QP7xssPcZflamjRHcX/aeba8bc59dd55ddc0301e4ab0f7646c4/c-card-recurring-en.png?w=1296&h=784&q=50&fm=png)
### Automated, recurring payments
Automatically collect payments on the due date, via Direct Debit. Even if the dates or amounts change. Perfect for subscriptions, instalments, and invoicing for services.
[See how automated payments work](http://gocardless.com/<https:/gocardless.com/features/recurring-payments/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1198'%20width='1980'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

### Access bank account data
Let your customers securely share their bank account data with you. From account info, to balances, and transaction data. With connections to 2,300+ banks across the UK and Europe.
[See how Bank Account Data works](http://gocardless.com/<https:/gocardless.com/bank-account-data/>)

Next
![](http://gocardless.com)![International payments made simple](https://images.ctfassets.net/40w0m41bmydz/7BMoypzhuxYkK3sCn8lra0/3c033e857f16ae9e77a5bef2698d7246/Global.png?w=24&h=24&q=50&fm=png)
### International payments made simple
Collect payments from 30+ countries. Either into a local bank account, or your existing UK account thanks to in-built FX at the real market rate. Powered by Wise.
[Learn more](http://gocardless.com/<https:/gocardless.com/international-payments/>)
![](http://gocardless.com)![Intelligently retry failed payments](https://images.ctfassets.net/40w0m41bmydz/4IoQTphhfj3mkgcQgIliLY/48c7e73a0152cd51797a4274995a551b/Decorative___Lightbulb_4x.png?w=24&h=24&q=50&fm=png)
### Intelligently retry failed payments
With GoCardless, failed payments are rare. But switch on automatic retries and our payments data determines the best day to try again. Recovering 70% of failed payments, on average.
[Learn more](http://gocardless.com/<https:/gocardless.com/solutions/success-plus/>)
![](http://gocardless.com)![Better for your customers, too](https://images.ctfassets.net/40w0m41bmydz/2YAH2ZhrCOFU3jhPs0S41d/43862301c069eef32d7b2901e7386888/Customer_4x.png?w=24&h=24&q=50&fm=png)
### Better for your customers, too
Businesses and consumers often prefer to make bank payments, instead of using cards and digital wallets. With automation and peace of mind, it’s not hard to see why.
[Learn more](http://gocardless.com/<https:/gocardless.com/g/b2b-b2c-preference-b/>)

Adam Cozens, Co-founder, Perky Blenders
[See what Perky Blenders and other businesses have to say](http://gocardless.com/<https:/gocardless.com/stories/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1980'%20width='1980'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](http://gocardless.com)![Sign up in minutes](https://images.ctfassets.net/40w0m41bmydz/2pW7fuobErjCpsCZMoMPgh/e31cbc32f5ed3f72eb4401b04ef3b53a/getting-started-1-en.png?w=1980&h=1980&q=50&fm=png)
## Start collecting payments now
01Sign up in minutes
[Get started](http://gocardless.com/<https:/manage.gocardless.com/signup>) without any obligations. Just tell us a few details about your business for security purposes, then start collecting payments hassle-free.
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='1980'%20width='1980'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](http://gocardless.com)![Sign up in minutes](https://images.ctfassets.net/40w0m41bmydz/2pW7fuobErjCpsCZMoMPgh/e31cbc32f5ed3f72eb4401b04ef3b53a/getting-started-1-en.png?w=1980&h=1980&q=50&fm=png)
02Choose how to use
Manage everything in our easy-to-use online dashboard. Or seamlessly connect to Xero, QuickBooks, or [350+ other systems](http://gocardless.com/<https:/gocardless.com/partners/>) to manage everything there.

## Payments. But without the hassle.
### End late payments
Easy for your customers to make instant, one-off payments. Or set them up for automated payments, so neither of you has to lift a finger.
### No more chasing
With GoCardless, you don’t have to rely on your customers remembering to pay on time. Saving you all those costly hours chasing up late payments.
### Automate admin
Easily see the status of any payment from any customer, any time. And if you connect GoCardless to your accounting system, reconciliation is automatic.
### Forget expensive fees
GoCardless collects direct bank payments. Meaning no card fees. And with all that wasted admin time cut away, the savings really stack up.

**GoCardless: Simplifying Payments for Businesses Globally**

Founded in 2011 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s Batch S11, GoCardless is on a mission to revolutionize the way payments are handled worldwide. The company believes that bank payments are the most efficient method for businesses to pay and collect payments, cutting out the stresses and costs associated with traditional methods like credit cards.

### What They Do
GoCardless offers a simple, automated way for businesses to collect both recurring and one-off payments directly from customer bank accounts, transcending borders with the ability to operate in over 30 countries and manage multiple currencies. To date, they cater to 75,000+ businesses globally, processing more than $30 billion annually.

But GoCardless isn’t just a one-trick pony; their suite of products addresses common pain points in payments, such as failed transactions and fraud, ensuring that businesses can navigate the complexities without sacrificing customer experience. The recent acquisition of Nordigen further extends their capabilities by enabling businesses to access vital insights from customer bank account data, improving financial decision-making.

### Key Features
1. **Ease of Use**: Clients can collect payments effortlessly, automating processes around subscriptions, invoices, and even installment plans.
2. **Open Banking Leader**: With their technical prowess, they provide secure and direct bank payment solutions, ensuring customer data protection while streamlining payments.
3. **Enhanced Recovery**: Their system includes intelligent retries for failed transactions, recovering around 70% of them, which is a game changer for cash flow management.
4. **Scalable Solutions**: Whether for small startups or large enterprises, GoCardless tailors its offerings to fit the specific needs of each client.

### Investment and Growth
Backed by renowned investors like Accel Partners, GV (formerly Google Ventures), and Bain Capital Ventures, GoCardless has built a robust framework to scale and innovate in the ever-evolving fintech landscape. Their global footprint spans cities including London, Paris, Riga, New York, and Melbourne, supported by a strong team of 900 employees.

### Conclusion
GoCardless is not just creating a payment platform; they're pioneering a global bank payment network designed to simplify and enhance the payment experience for businesses and their customers alike. By championing direct bank payments, they're helping organizations save time and money while ensuring seamless transactions.

For more information, check out their website: [GoCardless](http://gocardless.com).
